column1: mrs. precious ""prune"" porter| on thursday evening june 11
column2: 2015 ""precious heard the sound of gabriel's trumpet"". weeping may endure for a night
column3: but joy cometh in the morning. she passed in her home at muskogee
column4: oklahoma with her family by her side. services are pending with dyer of tulsa
column5: okla. when caring truly matters dyer cares""
